Params: {3: '...Unknown virus causing a pandemic... Panicking people, malfunctioning and crazed machines... Attack... Military... Frontlines... Medical... Warfare... We urge you to keep calm and...'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Mother', 3: "I will never agree to this! I-if my children become infected... That's a battlefield! Even if it's not the frontlines, it's too dangerous! I will never agree to this!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Father', 3: '...No one, not any organization, not any person can run from this duty... Nobody! That includes me! And this family!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Mother', 3: "Just use your authority! You're the chairman of the medical research center! Do something about it!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Father', 3: "You mean evading a draft...? This is a war of all humanity! There's nowhere to run as long as we're on Earth!", 4: '3'}
{3: 'After a clamorous argument, the two fall into a long and deep silence. Resounding in the house are the cries, gunfire, and mechanical buzzes of the virtual screen.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Let me go to the war zone. Please.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Brother', 3: "I'm never going there! If I go there, then there'll be no one to take over Father's position in the medical research center!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "He... can't go. Father's work requires a successor.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sister', 3: "Not me as well, I won't! I'm just a girl! And wasn't I to meet a boy from some chairman council?! I'll be engaged soon!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'And she... has someone she likes. If she goes to the war zone, then Mother will worry for her terribly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Then at least, I can do it like what Father and Mother said... for the good of humanity... right?', 4: '1'}
